levels.description: Immediately pushes back all enemies within range <@ba.vup>moderately</> in the direction this unit is facing, additionally <$ba.stun>stunning</> them for <@ba.vup>{forcer_s_2[hit_directly].stun}</> seconds (the <$ba.stun>stun</> duration is increased to <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds if the target collides with High Ground). If the target collides with another enemy, the enemy will also be <$ba.stun>stunned</> for <@ba.vup>{forcer_s_2[brush].stun}</> seconds.

If the target collides with another enemy, the enemy will also be <$ba.stun>stunned</> for <@ba.vup>{forcer_s_2[brush].stun}</> seconds.
